function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate healthcare delivery systems for mass casualties and emergencies","Impact":"Deadly consequences for patients and healthcare workers due to lack of essential supplies","Mitigation":"Improved JIT procurement process for essential medical and emergency supplies, enhanced planning for PPE inventory and critical care equipment","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, inventory tracking and forecasting tools","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Protectionism and in-ward looking policies on exports and tariff reductions/waivers","Impact":"Cooperation difficulties to cope with shortages, emphasis on profiteering, and dependence on cottage industries for essential production","Mitigation":"International cooperation agreements, reduction of trade barriers, and support for cottage industries","Technologies":"Trade negotiation platforms, economic modeling and simulation tools","People":"International trade stakeholders, cottage industry workers","Owner":"Government trade agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in infectious hospital waste due to the pandemic","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission, environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Advanced sterilization processes for hospital waste, upcycling discarded or retrieved materials and PPE","Technologies":"Thermal sterilization systems, microwave sterilization equipment, biochemical treatment processes","People":"Healthcare workers, waste management personnel","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, waste management companies"}]}
